title: Cassandra Goddess of Harmony
description: Cassandra is scared and alone, and meeting her destiny didn’t go as planned. She was innocent; he was mean. Both had no clue they were put in each other’s path for a higher calling.Feel the grief of Cassandra’s shattered past and be with her as she falls in love with a man she learns, is not who he seems. She won his heart but not his trust. That would take longer.Turn the pages to unfold the mystery of Cassandra and together, take an amazing trip into space to discover life amongst the stars.CASSANDRA goddess of harmony is action-packed with life, love, adventure, and a joining that tests the senses.
author: D.L. Behan
